arabic: اقْتَرَبَتِ السَّاعَةُ وَانشَقَّ الْقَمَرُ
english: The Last Hour has drawn near and the moon has split into two.

arabic: وَإِن يَرَوْا آيَةً يُعْرِضُوا وَيَقُولُوا سِحْرٌ مُّسْتَمِرٌّ
english: And if they (the disbelievers) see a sign (a miracle), they turn their faces away and say: ‘This is the powerful magic ever running down through ages.’

arabic: وَكَذَّبُوا وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
english: And they have rejected (the truth even now) and followed their vain desires. And everything (that has been promised) is to take place at the appointed time.

arabic: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُم مِّنَ الْأَنبَاءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
english: And indeed, the news has come to them (of the earlier communities) containing lessons of warning and admonition (on disbelief and disobedience).

arabic: حِكْمَةٌ بَالِغَةٌ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ النُّذُرُ
english: (This Qur’an) is perfect intellect and reason. Are the Warners still not of any benefit?

arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ الدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيْءٍ نُّكُرٍ
english: So turn your face away from them. The Day when the caller (angel) will call towards the most detestable thing (the expanse of the last assembly),

arabic: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَارُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنتَشِرٌ
english: With eyes cast down, they will come out of their graves like scattered locusts,

arabic: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى الدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ الْكَافِرُونَ هَـٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
english: Rushing towards the caller running. The disbelievers will say: ‘This is a very hard Day.’

arabic: ۞ كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا مَجْنُونٌ وَازْدُجِرَ
english: The people of Nuh (Noah) also denied before this. So they belied Our servant (Nuh [Noah], the Messenger) and said: ‘(He) is mad.’ And he was given threats.

arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَغْلُوبٌ فَانتَصِرْ
english: So he prayed to his Lord: ‘I am powerless (before the transgressions of my people) so exact revenge.’

arabic: فَفَتَحْنَا أَبْوَابَ السَّمَاءِ بِمَاءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍ
english: Then We opened the gates of heaven with torrential rain.

arabic: وَفَجَّرْنَا الْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَالْتَقَى الْمَاءُ عَلَىٰ أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ
english: And We burst springs from the earth. So the water (of the earth and the heaven) collected for the same purpose that had been decreed already (for their destruction).

arabic: وَحَمَلْنَاهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَاحٍ وَدُسُرٍ
english: And We carried him (Nuh [Noah]) in the (Ark) built with planks and nails,

arabic: تَجْرِي بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَاءً لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
english: Which floated before Our eyes (under Our security. All this) was done to exact revenge for him, Nuh (Noah), who was rejected.

arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَاهَا آيَةً فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
english: And surely, We made (the ruins of the Deluge) subsist as a sign. So is there anyone who will think (and take advice)?

arabic: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
english: So how My torment and My warning were!

arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
english: And indeed, We have made the Qur’an easy for direction and guidance, but is there anyone who will take advice?

arabic: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
english: (The people of) ‘Ad too rejected (the Messengers). So how (awful) My torment (upon them) and My warning were!

arabic: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِي يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُّسْتَمِرٍّ
english: Surely, We sent upon them a howling windstorm on a day of lasting evil (in their favour),

arabic: تَنزِعُ النَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُّنقَعِرٍ
english: That plucked out people as if they were uprooted stems of date-palms.

arabic: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
english: Then how (awful) My torment and My warning were!

arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
english: And indeed, We have made the Qur’an easy for direction and guidance, but is there anyone who will take advice?

arabic: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِالنُّذُرِ
english: (The people of) Thamud also rejected the Warning Messengers.

arabic: فَقَالُوا أَبَشَرًا مِّنَّا وَاحِدًا نَّتَّبِعُهُ إِنَّا إِذًا لَّفِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
english: So they said: ‘Are we to follow a human being who is one of us? Then we shall certainly run into error and insanity.

arabic: أَأُلْقِيَ الذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِن بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ
english: Has the direction and guidance (Revelation) been sent down to him alone out of all of us? The truth is that he is a great liar, self-conceited (and arrogant).’

arabic: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَّنِ الْكَذَّابُ الْأَشِرُ
english: They will come to know tomorrow (on the Day of Judgment) who is a great liar, self-conceited (and arrogant).

arabic: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُو النَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَارْتَقِبْهُمْ وَاصْطَبِرْ
english: Indeed, We are going to send a she-camel for them to test them. So, (O Salih,) wait for their (end) and continue observing patience.

arabic: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ الْمَاءَ قِسْمَةٌ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُّحْتَضَرٌ
english: And make it known to them that water has been divided between them (and the she-camel). Everyone will be served with the share of water by turn.

arabic: فَنَادَوْا صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
english: So they called one of their companions (named Qidar). He attacked (the she-camel with a sword) and hamstrung her.

arabic: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
english: Then how (awful) My torment and My warning were!

arabic: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَكَانُوا كَهَشِيمِ الْمُحْتَظِرِ
english: Verily, We sent upon them a terrible roar. So they became like a thatcher’s trampled stubble.

arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
english: And indeed, We have made the Qur’an easy for direction and guidance, but is there anyone who will take advice?

arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍ بِالنُّذُرِ
english: The people of Lut (Lot) also rejected the Warners.

arabic: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّا آلَ لُوطٍ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَاهُم بِسَحَرٍ
english: Surely, We sent a windstorm raining stones upon them except the family of Lut (Lot). We saved them (from the torment) in the later part of the night,

arabic: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي مَن شَكَرَ
english: With a special favour from Us. In the same way, We give reward to him who gives thanks.

arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا بِالنُّذُرِ
english: And no doubt, Lut (Lot) warned them of Our seizure but, having doubts about his warnings, they denied.

arabic: وَلَقَدْ رَاوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِ فَطَمَسْنَا أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
english: And indeed, they made up their minds to snatch from Lut (Lot) his guests. So We erased the structure of their eyes and stripped them of sight, then (said to them:) ‘Taste My punishment and warning.’

arabic: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
english: And surely, the everlasting punishment reached them early in the morning.

arabic: فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
english: Then (it was said to them:) ‘Taste My punishment and warning.’

arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
english: And indeed, We have made the Qur’an easy for direction and guidance, but is there anyone who will take advice?

arabic: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَ آلَ فِرْعَوْنَ النُّذُرُ
english: And surely, the Warners came to the people of Pharaoh (as well).

arabic: كَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَاهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
english: They denied all Our signs. Then We seized them with the seizure befitting the Glory of Almighty, All-Powerful.

arabic: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أُولَـٰئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَاءَةٌ فِي الزُّبُرِ
english: (O Quraysh of Mecca!) Are your disbelievers better than the people (before), or has your salvation been written in the (revealed) Books?

arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌ مُّنتَصِرٌ
english: Or do these (disbelievers) say: ‘We are a strong party dominant (over the Prophet [blessings and peace be upon him])’?

arabic: سَيُهْزَمُ الْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ الدُّبُرَ
english: Soon this party will be defeated (in the battlefield of Badr), and they will flee away, turning their backs.

arabic: بَلِ السَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَالسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
english: But their (actual) promise is the Last Hour, and the Last Hour is extremely terrible and most agonizing.

arabic: إِنَّ الْمُجْرِمِينَ فِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
english: Assuredly, the evildoers are in (the fold of) error and insanity (or Fire).

arabic: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِي النَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا مَسَّ سَقَرَ
english: The Day when they will be dragged into Hell on their faces (it will be said to them:) ‘Taste burning in Hell.’

arabic: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَاهُ بِقَدَرٍ
english: Surely, We have created everything according to a fixed measure.

arabic: وَمَا أَمْرُنَا إِلَّا وَاحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍ بِالْبَصَرِ
english: And Our command comes into action once and for all as the twinkling of an eye.

arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَا أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
english: And surely, We destroyed (many of) your groups. So is there anyone who will take advice?

arabic: وَكُلُّ شَيْءٍ فَعَلُوهُ فِي الزُّبُرِ
english: And whatever they did is (recorded) in (their) Books of Deeds.

arabic: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍ وَكَبِيرٍ مُّسْتَطَرٌ
english: And every (action), small or big, has been written.

arabic: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَنَهَرٍ
english: Indeed, the Godfearing will (rejoice) in gardens and streams,

arabic: فِي مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
english: And will (be seated) in special nearness to the Sovereign Lord of (true) power during holy sessions.
